channel.title: Global objects
channel.description:
ok so the cannons on the 2nd and 3rd floor of lumberbridge castle are fucked cuz of the client im guessing they look like parts of the attack skill cape emote i added a different cannon on top of it since i cudnt delete it and now wen i go to the first floor the cannons are there not on the 2nd floor wer they are suppose to be i know it has sumthin to do with the code "makeGlobalObject(****, ****, ****, *, 10);" because i looked up fedexers global object code and it said the 10 meant ground object how do i make them stay on their floor?
*in other words how do i change the height of the objects i add???????
[source = delta 317]

item.title: Global objects
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

didnt work no errors or anythin just didnt even show up

Read full topic

item.title: Global objects
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

the 10 is object Type, but forget about that.

anyways in PI it’s done like this

if (c.heightLevel == 3){ c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(11565, 2837, 3343, 1, 18); }

try something like that

Read full topic
